Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class SparseDataset< T >

A specialization of DataSet for use sparse data representation.

This object takes a matrix like this:

5 2 1 13 2 14 3 15 4 16 5
3 20 1 13 2 21 3
2 10 1 33 2
...

where first N number indicates how many elements, and following N*2 numbers are pairs of (index,value).
